title: Sweet Fruit, Sour Land
description: Winner of the Not the Booker Prize 2018Shortlisted for the Betty Trask Prize 2019In the last circle of luxury in a barren London, government ministers hold glamorous parties. Mathilde and Jaminder, evading hunger and the restrictions on women’s bodies, form an unbreakable bond. But there’s a high price for pleasure and escape is far from easy.
author: Rebecca Ley
